metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5333 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the extract_group_icon_cursor_resource function in b/wrestool/extract.c in icoutils before 0.31.1 allows local users to cause a denial of service (process crash) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted executable file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5333` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

icoutils - 0.31.1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This CVE is for "the separate vulnerability fixed by the introduction of the "size >= sizeof(uint16_t)*2" test in 1a108713ac26215c7568353f6e02e727e6d4b24a"

criterions.comment: icoutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.31.1-1').
